definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
lifetime/generation/group of people/class/classifier for generations/(literary) classifier for people

sentences.english: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to achievers.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒是平庸之輩向成就卓越者的讚頌。

sentences.english: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
sentences.chinese: 只有平庸之輩能永遠處在最佳狀態。

sentences.english: They have often raise a man from mediocrity to success.
sentences.chinese: 它們常常使一個平庸之輩邁向成功。

sentences.english: Most people don't want to be seen as average.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的人不想被看作平庸之輩。

sentences.english: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
sentences.chinese: 精神偉人總是遭到平庸之輩的強力反對。
